recipes.title: Vegan Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy vegan pancakes perfect for a healthy breakfast.
recipes.instructions: Mix the dry ingredients, then stir in the wet ingredients until combined. Cook on a hot skillet.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Omelette
recipes.description: A protein-packed vegetarian omelette filled with veggies.
recipes.instructions: Whisk the eggs, pour into a hot pan, add the vegetables, and fold the omelette.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Quick and easy avocado toast with optional toppings.
recipes.instructions: Toast the bread, mash the avocado, and spread it on the toast. Drizzle with olive oil and season.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A healthy quinoa salad with fresh vegetables and lemon dressing.
recipes.instructions: Mix all the ingredients together in a large bowl and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A hearty grilled chicken salad with fresh greens.
recipes.instructions: Grill the chicken until cooked through, slice it, and add it to the salad with dressing.

recipes.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: A nourishing Buddha bowl with roasted veggies and quinoa.
recipes.instructions: Assemble all the ingredients in a bowl, drizzle with tahini, and serve.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Tacos
recipes.description: Delicious vegetarian tacos with beans and vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Warm the tortillas, fill them with beans and veggies, and top with salsa.

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Pasta
recipes.description: Gluten-free pasta with a creamy tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook the pasta, mix with the sauce and cream, and top with parmesan.

recipes.title: Vegan Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and easy vegan stir fry with tofu and vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Stir fry the tofu and vegetables in soy sauce until cooked through.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Pizza
recipes.description: A vegetarian pizza with a variety of toppings.
recipes.instructions: Assemble the pizza and bake at 400Â°F for 15 minutes.
